Test.Name: All features under Door Entity are supported
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = true Capabilities.Lock = true Capabilities.Unlock = true Capabilities.DoubleLock = true Capabilities.Block = true Capabilities.LockDown = true Capabilities.LockOpen = true Capabilities.DoorMonitor = true Capabilities.LockMonitor = true Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = true Capabilities.Alarm = true Capabilities.Tamper = true Capabilities.Fault = true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault
All DoorControl events are suppoterd
Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: All features under Door Entity are not supported
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetDoorInfoList response contains only one DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = false Capabilities.Lock = false Capabilities.Unlock = false Capabilities.DoubleLock = false Capabilities.Block = false Capabilities.LockDown = false Capabilities.LockOpen = false Capabilities.DoorMonitor = false Capabilities.LockMonitor = false Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = false Capabilities.Alarm = false Capabilities.Tamper = false Capabilities.Fault = false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are NOT supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault All DoorControl events are suppoterd
Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: LockDown=false
Test.Description: GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo with LockDownDoor=false

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Lock Down Door: NOT SUPPORTED Other DoorEntity subfeatures are supporetd All DoorControl events are suppoterd Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: LockOpen not present
Test.Description: GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo without LockOpen

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: Lock Open Door: NOT SUPPORTED Other DoorEntity subfeatures are supporetd All DoorControl events are suppoterd Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Some features under Door Entity are supported
Test.Description: GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = false Capabilities.Lock = true Capabilities.Unlock = true Capabilities.DoubleLock = false Capabilities.Block = true Capabilities.LockDown = true Capabilities.LockOpen = true Capabilities.DoorMonitor not present Capabilities.LockMonitor = true Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = true Capabilities.Alarm = true Capabilities.Tamper = false Capabilities.Fault = not present

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported
• Access Door: NOT SUPPORTED • Lock Door: SUPPORTED • Unlock Door: SUPPORTED • Double Lock Door: NOT SUPPORTED • Block Door: SUPPORTED • Lock Down Door: SUPPORTED • Lock Open Door: SUPPORTED • Door Monitor: NOT SUPPORTED • LockMonitor: SUPPORTED • DoubleLockMonitor: SUPPORTED • Alarm: SUPPORTED • Tamper: NOT SUPPORTED • Fault: NOT SUPPORTED
All DoorControl events are suppoterd
Other feature request is out of scope

Test.Name: Door Control Events support: some events are supported
Test.Description:
GetEventPropertiesResponse contains only: tns1:Door/State/DoorMode Event topic
tns1:Door/State/DoubleLockPhysicalState Event topic tns1:Door/State/LockPhysicalState Event topic tns1:Door/Cahnged Event topic
tns1:Door/State/DoorFault Event topic

Door/State/DoorAlarm: NOT supported Door/State/DoorPhysicalState NOT supported Door/State/DoorTamper NOT supported Door/Removed NOT supported
Other events are supported

Test.Name: All Door events are not supported

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: All Door events are not supported
DoorEntity is supported as mandatory All fetures under DoorEntity not supported

Test.Name: Get DoorInfo in
Test.Description: DUT returns correct GetCapabilitiesResponse message DUT returns correct GetServicesResponse message GetServices response contains “http://www.onvif.org/ver10/doorcontrol/wsdl” namespace GetDoorInfoList response contains DoorInfo with: Capabilities.Access = true Capabilities.Lock = true Capabilities.Unlock = true Capabilities.DoubleLock = true Capabilities.Block = true Capabilities.LockDown = true Capabilities.LockOpen = true Capabilities.DoorMonitor = true Capabilities.LockMonitor = true Capabilities.DoubleLockMonitor = true Capabilities.Alarm = true Capabilities.Tamper = true Capabilities.Fault = true

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
Door control service is supported Door Entity is supported Following features are supported: • Access Door • Lock Door • Unlock Door • Double Lock Door • Block Door • Lock Down Door • Lock Open Door. • Door Monitor • LockMonitor • DoubleLockMonitor • Alarm • Tamper • Fault
All DoorControl events are suppoterd
Other feature request is out of scope
